title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.35 - Town of Van Buren
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.35 - Town of Van Buren

State Regulations
(a) Jones Road
between IR 690 and Van Buren Road. (b) Van Buren Road between Jones Road and a
point 3,650+- feet north of Jones Road. (c) Route 173. Route 173 between Route 31 and
the Sysco Frosted Foods, Inc. plant in Warners, in the Town of Van Buren; provided, however, that this route is designated as an access highway for use
by tandem trailer combinations and by vehicles up to 102 inches wide only, and
is not hereby designated as an access highway for tractor-semi trailer
combinations with an overall length greater than 55 feet with a 49-foot trailer
or greater than 60 feet with a 45- foot trailer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8131.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
